IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_inventory') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_inventory GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_inventory @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT id, item_code, item_count, slot_id FROM dbo.Guild_Inventories WHERE guild_id = @guild_id
SELECT item_id, open_socket_count, fragment_count, socket_skill_code_1, socket_skill_code_2, socket_skill_code_3, socket_skill_code_4, socket_skill_code_5 FROM dbo.Guild_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE guild_id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_inventory') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_inventory GO
